<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<j:jelly trim="false" xmlns:j="jelly:core" xmlns:g="glide" xmlns:j2="null" xmlns:g2="null">	
	<!-- Include the UI scripts -->
	<g:requires name="x_ouhs2_risk_asses.RAS_Functions.jsdbx" params="cache=$[jvar_stamp]" />

		input[id*="#u_does_the_data_set_include_any_of_the_following"] {display: none; visibility: hidden;}*/

		#x_ouhs2_risk_asses_risk_assessment_services.u_does_the_data_set_include_any_of_the_following {display: none;}
		
		/*
		.annotation-wrapper {
			color: #841617 !important;

		HTML[data-doctype=true] input[type='radio'] {
    margin-right: .25em;
    margin-left: 1em;
    margin-top: 0em;
}
		*/
		
		/*.form-field.input_controls {width: 30px !important; float: left !important;}*/
		div[type="boolean"] {float: right; text-align: left; width: 95%;}
		div[type="boolean"] .control-label {
			text-align: left;
			width: 100%;
			padding: 6px 0 0;
		}
		div[type="boolean"] + .input_controls {
			float: left;
			width: 5%;
		}
		
		.annotation-wrapper {
		    font-weight: normal !important;
			padding: 7px 15px 3px 15px !important;
			margin-top: 20px !important;
			<!-- background-color: #841617 !important;
			border-bottom: 5px solid #B24445 !important; -->
		}
		
		#Save {
    color: #fff;
    background-color: #278efc;
    border-color: #0368d4;
}
		#sysverb_delete {
		color: #fff;
    background-color: #f95050;
    border-color: #f71f1f;
		}
		
/*	
		div[type="choice"] {
    width: 100%;

}

}*/
		
		ul {margin: 0 0 0 35px;}
		
		/* Radio buttons */
		.HSCRadioLabel {padding: 5px 5px 5px 0; margin-right: 15px;}
		input[type="radio"].HSCRadio {margin: 0;}
		
		/* Check boxes */
		.HSC_CB {opacity: 0}
/* input[type="checkbox"] + label[for]:before { */
		input[type="checkbox"] + .HSC_CBLabel {
			cursor: pointer;
		}
.HSC_CBLabel:before {
		font-family: "retina_icons";
		content: "";
    width: 20px;
    height: 20px;
    z-index: 2;
    position: relative;
    background: #f2f2f2;
    padding: 0;
		vertical-align: middle;
		text-align: center;
	margin-right: 10px;
    border-radius: 2px;
    border: 1px solid rgba(0,0,0,.07);
    float: left;
    cursor: pointer;
}
		.HSC_CB:checked + .HSC_CBLabel:before {
			/*content: "✔";*/
